item.title: Mark Edmondson Presentations
item.description: Presentation links Gathering in one place links to presentations I’ve made over the years. Evolving R with Docker and the Cloud - Rv1.0.0’s 20th Birthday celebRation, Copenhagen 2020-02-29 R at scale on the Google Cloud Platform - CopenhagenR, 2019-05-19 Man vs Machine - Superweek 2019 and Web Analytics Wednesday Copenhagen - 2019-02-01 #rstats lessons for #measure - Digital Analytics Congres, Utrecht. 2018-10-09 Beyond the Cloud with Digital Analytics - Web Analytics Wednesday Copenhagen.
